timeline.bodyText: Will service.reachedDesiredState() include evaluating RUNNING and FINISHED check?
timeline.author: abanthiy

replies.bodyText:
I didn't want to change the existing behavior, so that's why I'm only checking for desired state when the service isn't autostarted (ie. for on-demand lambda).
Technically the desired state could be fulfilled by a regular service if it isn't running or finished because the state transition list could just be empty (before getting filled up)
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: ok, ya that race condition can happen. NIT: Might be good to wrap the last condition in its own brackets.
replies.author: abanthiy

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I did, but PMD complained that they were unnecessary. I guess I could have just ignored it.
